# IExtensionFileService interface

Provides filesystem operations specific to an extension.

```csharp
public interface IExtensionFileService
```

## Members

| name | description |
| --- | --- |
| [ResolvePath](IExtensionFileService/ResolvePath.md)(…) | Returns the full path to a file included in the calling extension, relative to the root directory containing the extension. |
